SEARCH
Package com.example.fusion0.helpers

Class QRCode

java.lang.Object
com.example.fusion0.helpers.QRCode
public class QRCode extends Object
/** * Represents a QR code object that is uniquely generated based on an event ID. * The QR code can be used to identify specific events and retrieve associated * event data from Firestore. This class provides methods for generating the * QR code as a hashed string and an image, as well as retrieving an event ID * from a QR code hash.
Author:
Malshaan

    Class

    static interface 
    QRCode.EventIdCallback
    Callback interface for handling the Firestore response for an event ID lookup.

  • Constructor Details

    • QRCode

      public QRCode(String eventId) throws WriterException
      Constructs a QRCode object for a specified event ID. This constructor initializes the QR code as a hashed string and generates the QR code image as a Bitmap.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event for which the QR code is generated.

  • Method Details

    • generateHash

      public static String generateHash(String input)
      Generates a hashed QR code string using the SHA-256 algorithm. This method takes an input string, typically an event ID, and returns a hashed representation to uniquely identify the event.
      Parameters:
      input - The input string to be hashed (e.g., an event ID).
      Returns:
      A hashed string representing the QR code.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if SHA-256 algorithm is unavailable.

    • getQrCode

      public String getQrCode()
      Returns the hashed QR code string.
      Returns:
      The hashed string that represents the QR code.

    • getQrImage

      public Bitmap getQrImage()
      Returns the generated QR code image as a Bitmap.
      Returns:
      The QR code image as a Bitmap.

    • generateQRCodeImage

      public Bitmap generateQRCodeImage(int width, int height, String qrCode) throws WriterException
      Generates a QR code image from the given QR code string. This method uses ZXing to create a Bitmap from the hashed QR code string.
      Parameters:
      width - The width of the QR code image.
      height - The height of the QR code image.
      qrCode - The hashed string to be encoded into a QR code image.
      Returns:
      A Bitmap representation of the QR code.

    • getEventIdFromHash

      public static void getEventIdFromHash(String hash, QRCode.EventIdCallback callback)
      Retrieves the event ID associated with a specified QR code hash from Firestore. This method performs an asynchronous Firestore query to find the event associated with the given QR code hash. The result is provided via the EventIdCallback.
      Parameters:
      hash - The hashed QR code string to search for in Firestore.
      callback - Callback interface to handle the Firestore response.
